member.name: T:DlhSoft.DataControlLibrary.HierarchicalDataAdapter
member.summary: Hierarchical data adapter component. Adapts a data source that defines its hierarchy through key and parent key members so that it will be supported in hierarchical controls that require an index and indent level-based hierarchy.

member.name: F:DlhSoft.DataControlLibrary.HierarchicalDataAdapter.components
member.summary: Required designer variable.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.DataControlLibrary.HierarchicalDataAdapter.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.DataControlLibrary.HierarchicalDataAdapter.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.DataControlLibrary.HierarchicalDataAdapter.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new hierarchical data adapter component instance.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.DataControlLibrary.HierarchicalDataAdapter.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.IContainer)
member.summary: Creates a new hierarchical data adapter component instance.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.DataControlLibrary.HierarchicalDataAdapter.InitializeDataBinding(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes data binding from the relational data source to the specified hierarchical data source, setting the indent level values accordingly.
member.param: Indicates the source of hierarchical data, defined by key and indent level members, for the hierarchical data adapter component
Indicates a sub-list of the hierarchicalDataSource to use; can be null or empty
Specifies the key property name of the hierarchical databound items (the property type should implement IComparable)
Specifies the indent level property name of the hierarchical databound items (the property type should be integer)

member.name: M:DlhSoft.DataControlLibrary.HierarchicalDataAdapter.SuspendDataBinding
member.summary: Suspends data binding from the relational data source to the hierarchical data source; you need to call InitializeDataBinding again to resume it.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.DataControlLibrary.HierarchicalDataAdapter.OnDataBindingComplete
member.summary: Raises the DataBindingComplete event.

member.summary: Raises the DataSourceChanged event.

member.summary: Raises the DataMemberChanged event.

member.summary: Raises the KeyMemberChanged event.

member.summary: Raises the ParentKeyMemberChanged event.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.DataControlLibrary.HierarchicalDataAdapter.DataSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the source of relational data, defined by key and parent key members, for the hierarchical data adapter component.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.DataControlLibrary.HierarchicalDataAdapter.DataMember
member.summary: Gets or sets a sub-list of the DataSource to use in the hierarchical data adapter component.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.DataControlLibrary.HierarchicalDataAdapter.KeyMember
member.summary: Gets or sets the key property name of the relational databound items (the property type should implement IComparable).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.DataControlLibrary.HierarchicalDataAdapter.ParentKeyMember
member.summary: Gets or sets the parent key property name of the relational databound items (the property type should implement IComparable).

member.summary: Occurs when a data bound operation is complete.
